entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
